modName: Tyrael Armor and El druin sword
summary: This mod is a retexture of the Tyrael armor by newermind43 and fsdfsr. I wanted to have a Tyrael armor like the one in Diablo III with the white hood and I am pretty sure I wasn’t the only one so I made it, tested it and now I am putting it on Nexus exclusively. I have also added the sword of Tyrael from Diablo III. All these items are craftable
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://www.otakia.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/06/diablo_3_tyrael_ange-1024x440.jpg[/img]

[b][u]To all members:[/u][/b]
Btw if you have any screenshots of my mod, feel free to put them on the mod page so other members will see different views from different players. Also, feel free to make video reviews on youtube and tell me if you do so I can put them on the mod page.

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
This mod adds a new armour set called “Armor of Justice” of Tyrael the Archangel of Justice from the Diablo games. The armour comes in two versions: a heavy version and a light version. It is a combined version of Newermind43 and fsdfsr armours with my touch of retexture, thanks to them for their work. And also thanks to Zeratulpro as the main author of the armour from Oblivion Nexus.

You can also have the wings! You just have to equip the appropriate ring and you will get the wings. They aren’t moving and I don’t know how to make an animation so I don’t think I will ever make them animated, but who knows ;).
You can also have El'Druin, the sword of Tyrael. I wanna thanks siberok92 for helping me fix the textures. He made a new UV map to make the colours correctly displayed. Go check his awesome mods too!

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]HOW TO GET IT[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=#DB7900]Defeating the boss:[/color]
You can now find the armour by defeating the corrupted Archangel of Justice and by taking his equipment. To find him, you will first have to find a table with maps on it in Dragonsreach... He is wearing the corrupted armour and you have to find the non-corrupted one after killing him but it's not very hard you'll see ;)

It will lead you to the great maze of Tyrael. If you want to do it legit, I recommend you to do it in first person because you sometimes see over the walls when you are in third person.
Be careful, there are some traps and some enemies in it ;).

[color=#DB7900]Crafting it:[/color]
You can also craft it at the Skyforge. Everything is now craftable. You will need the "Glass Smithing" perk to craft the light version and "Ebony Smithing" to craft the heavy version. El'druin and the rings will unlock with either perks. All items appear under the "Misc" section.

[color=#DB7900]Easy way:[/color]
I included a chest near the main door of High Hrothgar. Every armour piece (light and heavy and the swords of the two version justice and corrupted) are in it. See pictures to find the exact location.

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]FUTURE PLANS[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
I am currently very busy with school and I don't have a lot of time to work on the mod but I look at all your requests and I try to satisfy them when I can so it might take sometimes before I upload new updates. Please be patient :)

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
To install this mod you have two options:
1) You can use the NMM by simply downloading it and then click “DOWNLOAD WITH MANAGER”
2) Or you can download it manually and then extract the data file and copy it into the Skyrim folder normally located under C:/ProgramFiles/Steam/SteamApps/common

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]UNINSTALL[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
You just have to make the inverse process of the installation. By NMM or by deleting the “armour of justice” file from the meshes and texture folders in Skyrim data folder. You will also have to delete the ESP file located in the Skyrim data folder too.

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]PERMISSION[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
If you want to use this mod's resources for your own mods, I am happy to share my mod and you can use as you please. All I ask you in return is that you give me credits for my work where you will be using it.

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]VIDEO REVIEWS[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[youtube]kxgBz7PAU84[/youtube] [youtube]M4YNPLwOc0c[/youtube]
[youtube]cKO1SleYWPg[/youtube]

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]HISTORY[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

v1.7
-Renamed armors with "Tyrael" as a pre-fix for better organization in the inventory.
-Light version requires Glass Smithing Perk
-Heavy version requires Ebony Smithing Perk
-Weapons and Rings require either Glass or Ebony Smithing Perk
-All items now appear under the "Misc" section on the crafting window at the Skyforge
-Reduced the shine on the armor that made it near impossible to admire correctly :p
-Optimized Textures

v1.6
-Wearing all of the heavy pieces now properly gives you the appropriate armor bonus.
-Fixed wrong inventory image for the Cuirass
-Fixed maze to prevent you from falling through the ground.

v1.5
-Fixed the College of Winterhold problem.
-Every item is now craftable.
-Made a maze to get to the boss
-Added a chest near High Hrothgar with every item in it for those who don't want to go through the maze or craft it.

v1.4
-Added corrupted version. The Corrupted Archangel is wearing it so you have to kill him to get the two versions.
-Created new environment preventing accessibility problems like the old version.

v1.3
-Changed the name of the sword to El'Druin, its real name.
-Combined the armour and sword files into one file.
-Added a boss you have to find and kill if you don't or can't forge it.

v1_2
-Fixed the textures of the sword. It is now a complete file not a WIP anymore.

v1.1
-Added more glows to the armour.

v1.0
-First version of the mod. it includes the four armour parts(hood,cuirass,gloves and boots) plus the wings ring.

[color=#DB7900]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]CREDITS[/b]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
-I wanna thank Zeratulpro as the original author of the armour from Oblivion Nexus.
-Thanks to newermind43 and fsdfsr who allowed me to use and tweak their files of the armour to make my mod.
-Thanks to siberok92 for fixing the sword UV map.
-A huge thank to OozyGorilla who came out of nowhere and gave me all my files emptied of all the little bugs and problems I had before version 1.7. He did an awesome job simply out of kindness. He's a really nice guy and you should go and check out his work.
-Thanks to Bethesda for making Skyrim.
author: Alextrep
